attributes.action: Make the ID Card available to all British Citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Identity and Passport Service have stated that the ID Card will only be available to British Residents, and not Ex Pats unless they are planning to return to the UK. 

All British Citizens should be entitled to hold the National ID Card, if Ex Pats visit the UK they are not going to carry a passport in the country of birth, therefore the ID Card system is flawed.

Equality for all, or abandon the system.
